name: Russian Hentai 3
description:
This is the 3rd part of Russian Hentai. This time you have to defend your village from the gopniks.
You are a simple country girl, but only you are capable of dealing with gopniks.
In the season of flowering sunflowers, gopniks are very active and go to harvest these flowers in neighboring villages. This time they made a mistake and chose your village.
Your task is to prevent them from collecting all the flowers.
Enemies are scattered all over the map in gangs of 5 people. Your task is to find all the gangs and destroy them. To do this, you have 6 types of different weapons in your arsenal. But not everything is so simple, the gopniks are also armed.
Don't let the gopniks collect all the sunflowers, destroy your enemies.

  • 1 beautiful map
  • 6 types of weapons
  • Advanced AI
